website_summaries.verdict: Offering a secure fit, this adjustable waist trainer looks good and comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Features sturdy fasteners, a low-profile fit, and torso-length design that owners report provide maximum results
Fits most wearers precisely with its 4 rows of closures and slightly stretchy fit
cons: Some wearers report that it rolls up while sitting and has an odd smell at first

customer_reviews.title: Gives Hourglass Figure
customer_reviews.text: On day 1 of wearing it and absolutely love it! I'm 5'5, 186 pounds, pear shaped, and ordered the Large. I'm on the tightest clasp and love it. I figured I would wear it for a month or so then purchase a Medium. Gives me a great hourglass figure and smooths everything out. It does make me have a little back fat at the top and bottom but it is complete unnoticeable once dressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best waist trainer I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I've sold more than 20 of these to people. I tell them where to buy them from on here. I should work for this company! I love this waist trainer. I have 7 and this is the best brand. I just bought an XXS ! I had the XS. My waist is now 24-23 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Losing Inches Soooooo Fast "What's A Waist"
customer_reviews.text: Sooo I Did A Review On The Size XL Waist Trainer Last Month. Now I'm In The Size Medium && My Results Are Amazing. I Started Off With A 35" Waist Im Currently Measuring At 29". I'm So Happy & Excited To Hit My Goal Waist Size Of 26". Don't Hesitate This Is A Must Buy & Very Affordable. Diet & Exercise Is A Must When Trying To see Results!
customer_reviews.author: ExoticNBadd

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! Buying as Christmas gifts(is that rude) lol I ordered about 1-2 sizes smaller Because I am on weight loss journey and it fits perfect after I wore it and worked it in for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: KristiansBeauty

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: There are patches of mold growing inside the waist trainer and the packaging didn't look new. I'm assuming I got a returned item that was already used by someone else. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ma

customer_reviews.title: It smoothes and gives a nice hour glass shape
customer_reviews.text: Got here fast and worth the price. It smoothes and gives a nice hour glass shape, see my photos for proof. I am top heavy so have a hard time with posture, and this helps me 100% with posture. Love!!! [It does have a weird smell, wash before use in my opinion.]
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I liked it worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1" I weigh 170 pounds.I got that extra large. I should've gotten a large. I'm still wearing this and will probably order the large In a month. It did smell but only for one day. And it really wasn't that bad smelling.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad
customer_reviews.text: I felt compelled to leave a review, since I never do. I have used quite a few waist trainers since the birth of my third child. This one is by far the worst. The material is thick and rubbery, but doesn’t really increase heat. It rolls inward at the top, which is very uncomfortable and noticeable. The trainer itself doesn’t reach from my bra strap to my pants like others have. So I have to decide where I need it more. The stitching along the inside is also uncomfortable. The treads rub me and itch! So when I take it off there are red marks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 194 lbs and my waist is 34 inches. I recently decided to train my waist and so I've tried a few other brands over time. What I like about this product is that it is super comfortable and can be worn to the gym. It's not very noticeable under clothing as well. It fits perfectly even though the latex is a little less thinner than the others I'm accustom to. What can you expect anyway with such a good price! I bought the medium and i mostly wear it on the first set of hooks. I sometimes wear it on the middle set of hooks if I want more tension! I definitely intent to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this latex waist cincher is the best, i bought a few in the past but ...
customer_reviews.text: this latex waist cincher is the best, i bought a few in the past but was never satisfied they never fit as expected. When i ordered this waist cincher on amazon i was kind of skeptical, but when i received and tried it on i was impressed by how smoothly it fit it was the perfect fit, the little pooch stomach i had was invisible under it i was amazed. After a week of wearing them every day my stomach is noticeably flatter. It is invisible under your clothing no one can tell that your wearing a waist cincher. This is a great buy, you cannot go wrong, would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I I liked about this cincher is that the 9 flexibone supports ...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I I liked about this cincher is that the 9 flexibone supports were very flexible and seemed durable, they also didn't carve into my body like other waist trainers I've tried. I chose this waist trainer because the description said it was for long torsos. Unfortunately, it isn't long and to make things worse the hook and eye closure doesn't go all the way to the top on either side which causes the top and bottom of the cincher to fold down about an inch on both top and bottom making it even shorter on me and very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Aleman

customer_reviews.title: I like this waist trainer a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this waist trainer a lot; it is my first time using one, but I am very very pleased with the quality of it for the price. If I had one complaint, it would be that it is a bit long (although I am only 5'2") - This definitely causes a LOT of bust push-up and a bit of bulge at the bottom. Nothing I can't deal with. I am 150 lbs, and ordered a small. It is DEFINITELY tight, but that is what I wanted. Beauty is pain!! :D
customer_reviews.author: MadProfessional

customer_reviews.title: No no no thanks
customer_reviews.text: So, first of all this is too short. I know my waist/hip size so I ordered what I needed. It’s short, made of weird rubbery type material inside, and absolutely 100% rolls both up and down. I’m not sure what product other people got but this must not be it because it’s definitely not good! I was able to do the second clasp and it was a hot mess, so I switched to the first, which was a little looser than I’d want a waist trainer/shaper to be, and it was no better. Rolling up, rolling down. What a disaster. Definitely wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P

customer_reviews.title: Serious waist trainer, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: *update:This product is of great quality! Fit was right on, it is very durable. Been wearing it daily and have moved onto the last hooks. I have been dieting and this helps me eat less. I am only 5'3" so for me the trainer is a bit long but works. It doesn't roll/bunch up either. A bit uncomfortable under breasts so I have to pull it down. Again, taller women/smaller breasts will love it even more!!!! So happy I found this!!! Please make in beige!!! Had to buy one from another company and it is horrible....
customer_reviews.author: NFraiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 140lbs, I ordered a size small and it fits perfectly on notch 1. It fits my torso perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: TinaSosmiLee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Im convinced all these reviews are fake...this waist trainer is trash. It stretches and loosen up aftet 1 week of wearing it. It has no legit.holding power, i honestly want my money back my money dont grow on trees to play with you all and your lies
customer_reviews.author: Keewanee Little

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Been two weeks already lost two inches! Love love love! Will buy again. True to size
customer_reviews.author: shaunajayy

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell, not for long torso it is short
customer_reviews.text: Bad smell, not for long torso it is short, and worst part it rolls down from the top I've never had a problem with other waist trainers
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. My waist is like 33" and I purchased a medium;Even though that's a 2" difference I really have goals. It's not long,but I'm not that tall 5'5". I was able to use the first set of hooks. I will continue using it. Update: been wearing it for at least 8 hrs since I've received it.. NOTE YOU CANNOT WEAR TO BED.. ladies this is the most painful thing to wear. I've had these before and slept in them without that much uncomfortable pain,but this will destroy your back. Great for day wear but can't sleep in it.. next week I'll be ready for the second hooks. So excited to be in a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Feels good and made well
customer_reviews.text: Now, this is only day two of wearing it, but it is surprisingly comfortable. I am 5’4” And weigh 130 pounds. I am wearing a size small. I had my second baby two months ago, and I have about 3 inches of extra abdominal fat from pregnancy. I exercise on a regular basis and eat a very clean diet. I am hoping this will help in conjunction with a healthy lifestyle. I will update in a few months to see any progress.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: ... this product is definitely not for a long torso like seen in the picture or described above
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and this product is definitely not for a long torso like seen in the picture or described above. Very disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't suck in anything on the tightest clasp
customer_reviews.text: GUIDE YOURSELF WITH THE SIZING LISTED! I was a bit doubtful since I had previously purchased a cincher that was sold here but made in China. With Chinese wardrobe you always have to go up in size. I ordered next size up, the cincher fit, but it didn't suck in anything on the tightest clasp. I had to return it and get a small. It fits comfortably! and quality feels excellent. I recommend. Is perfect for everyday wear underneath your regular clothes. It is not for working out though, this thing is made of latex and has an inside lining that is velvety, so it is too hot for that.
customer_reviews.author: TheShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: It shows.. I can’t wear this  under anything
customer_reviews.text: I want to use this product for Shapeware , It is great quality. The latex smell goes away if you dressed air it out for a day or two. As far as wearing the garment underneath of clothing, it shows through. If you are wearing a tight dress, shirt, thin fabric, the claps show through. So I Haven’t worn it As shapewear. I used it when I sleep and that’s about it, once you get past the construction feeling it is nice and warm to wear at night . And you wake up the next morning and you look thinner and can see the difference because you sweat out some of the toxins and such.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!! Stink is an understatement!
customer_reviews.text: I almost lost it when I opened shipping envelope!!!! People talked about a rubber smell and to air it out??? This smelled like roadkill a month later!!!! Terrible! Well I've been airing it out for 2 solid days now and the roadkill smell is almost gone. .But the rubber side is so sticky it stays on your fingers! Size? I wear a 7 junior pants and small womens top but ordered up due to reviews. I can barely connect the first row and I ordered M/L I would need an XXL!!!! Going back!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this fits. I got it today, so I’m not sure if it’ll shred inches off my waist yet. However, I notice immediate results after putting it on. It also looks very nice under clothes, I can’t see it at all, even when wearing tight and/or thin clothing. I’m 5’ 5” and 130 pounds, I ordered a size xs and it fits well. It was somewhat difficult to get on, but not too bad. Overall, I really love this waist trainer and I do not have any complaints. I’m already pretty small, so there’s not a huge difference, I’m really only looking to shrink my waist, which this thing definitely does for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Manion

customer_reviews.title: Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: 7 weeks ago, i started at a 36.5" waist (was 38" at the beginning of my weight loss journey) and ordered XL (33.5-35.0) because according to the reviews, people mentioned sizing down 1 sz. 4 weeks later, I dropped to 34" and ordered size M (29.5-31). It was a tight fit, but I made it work... and now at 7 weeks into waist training, I am at 32" and I just ordered size S (27.5-29). Every size I purchased fit snug, but I am still able to breathe. I wear this daily for about 8-10 hours and take it off when I get home from work. I would totally recommend this in conjunction with diet and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Body Shaper - Cinched Waist 👍
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer does give a great hourglass figure as well as helping with posture. I wish it was longer cause it either isn’t high up enough to cover the back fat or it isn’t low enough to completely cover the dreaded lower abdominal pouch. Also I do wish it was steel boned, as I have noticed overtime that it has began to crease or have a ripple effect if you wear it all day in normal places you bend. I would still recommend because overall it’s a good body shaper to wear underneath clothes.
customer_reviews.author: BabyGyrlK

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 2xl and I am on the last hooks. I wish I had purchased the xl but will use this one until it is too big to use. I use it over a sweat "belt" when I workout. It is very very comfortable even during a workout. Gave it a 4/5 stars due to sizing. Just for reference: I'm 5'6", 184 lbs, 37.5 waist, wear a size 10 in pants & a large in blouses.
customer_reviews.author: YOro

customer_reviews.title: Go up in size but you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a 3x I am 5'1 230lb and this shaper fits very snug and pinches above my hips. I will give a better update after I wear it some more. It is made very well and has a cotton inner liner the outside is a rubber and the clasps are metal and has built in contours for more of a hourglass shape. This product is worth the price just go up a size at least. As for me I should have gotten a 4x to start off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great idea if you are like me, average weight and you just wanna lose some midsection rolls without total body weight loss. This is Week 2 of me wearing this and I am already on the middle row. I wear it after applying LANCS topical skin gel and have been doing this daily for 10hrs each day - pretty much while at work including the commute. First day was uncomfortable but by day 3, it was no big deal. Two points in the back hurt after leaving it on for about 3hrs. Otherwise, it's the best waist trainer I've ever owned and I have plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Shola

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.text: Just got her out of the mailbox and put her on... And and I LOVES!!! Why? 1. It feels like a snug hug around my middle which immediately improves my posture and lifts my chest. 2. The MEDIUM is tight yet comfortable. I'm 5'7 173 lbs 34 inch waist and am wearing it in the 1st set of hooks. 3. Because I'm kinda short waisted it covers everything from my bra down to lower abdomen just right! 4. I have on a white shirt (I purchased black) and it seems undetectable. It does have a faint rubbery smell...but nothing I can't handle 😅. So yeah...I'd recommend and purchase again...especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Lose with this Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’4”, about 172 lbs. I actively workout and love this brand of waist trainer for workout and daily wear. I use it more for workouts but when I feel the need will wear it out dancing or to work. This is my 3rd. The 1st I purchased last year (XL) and it became too big and I sized down to a (L). I lost my (L) during a recent move. I’d slacked the gym daily because of schedule restraints but am back after 3 months. I did continue to watch my diet and ordered a (M). It works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Lady

customer_reviews.title: Size runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: For the size reference given this product fit extremely small which means I just threw away 25$ of my hard earned money for something I can never wear
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. I am 5' 7" and 145 lbs... ordered a small and it was just right. Slowly getting closer and closer into the last usable loops until I go to an XS. I think I notice a difference! Been wearing for 3 weeks straight. Pretty flat and unless youre wearing a reaaaallllyyy thin shirt thats super tight... you can't tell you're wearing it! I'm a pretty big critic so 5 stars from me is a compliment lol I've ordered so many other types and they all sucked compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: isabella weeks

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAIST TRAINER EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My waist is 36, I bought the Medium and it fits comfortably enough that I wear it to work all day. It gives a great sinch in the waist because the latex is very strong. I've only been wearing it now for 1 week; so far I do not see any results as yet but just having it on, helps me to be more aware of my abdominal muscle, so I tend to contract them more in my daily activities. In doing so, I'm sure I'll have of a "trimmer" waist in a few months. I'm very excited to see the end results; fingers crossed!! I own 3 waist trainers....this is the best one! I love it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just like I was hoping!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. I was supposed to get an XL according to my waist (34.5") but I'm used to wearing a tight fitting trainner so I went for the Mdeium like another user recommended. It works perfectly. I have it on the first setting and it wasn't too bad putting it on. I had to lay down the first time but it's getting easier every day. The smell wasn't too bad. I didn't wash it, just laid it on the back of my rocking chair for a day. My fingers smell pretty latexy after snapping it on but no one else can smell it. Will buy the next size down as I get smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Michele H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package the first thing I noticed was how strong and sturdy the material felt. I was very impressed with the quality of this shaper. However, I feel like they run big. I'm 5'4 and about 215lbs but I carry most of my weight in my bottom half. I measured my waist and it's 38 inches. I ordered the 2xl and was easily able to close it on the tightest clasp. I'm sending it back for a large. I'll give an update once I get the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Photo P

customer_reviews.title: Started with a small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small based on reviews, but was slightly hesitant. Starting with a 30" waist - after wearing it on the first hook for weeks (at night for 8 hours), combined with other things - like eating better went down to 29" ...then incorporated a 3-day liquid cleanse, lots of water in my diet, and intermittent fasting, now at 28.5" and on the 2nd hook (which honestly, when I first put this on, I thought would never be a real thing lol). Goaling to get to 26" not just with this, but this to help shape. Great find, very solid material and hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Make sure you use the size chart they have in the picture. Each day I was able to get to the next row of hooks. So if you can do it!! This isn't permanent you have to put in the work and wear it daily. It's very comfortable I can wear it for 10 hrs. I'm 5'7 160lbs and have a very long torso. I had a 29 Inch waist so I bought the Small and I just ordered the XS to see if I can get it on now and it's only been a week. I wear mine to work everyday and I love how it makes you have great posture.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Elizabeth Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I was SO skeptical about this product because I always see ads for waist trainers that cost upwards of $50, but decided to give this one a shot and holy wow I’m glad I did. After reading reviews I decided to go with a small. I’m 5’4” and 140 pounds and this fits on the loosest setting now. I could have gone with a medium and probably used it on the tightest setting but the small will be used longer. I tried it on and immediately looked 3-4 inches smaller. I was shocked at how well it moved with my body and didn’t make me feel suffocated. This thing is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Exactly what I wanted and it's comfy.. doesn't dig into my back or hips.. sitting with it is a little uncomfortable but that's to be expected... But overall I'm satisfied. Shipping ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: I put it on and it held me in so well that i alsmost forgot what i use to look like far as small waistline and flat tummy
customer_reviews.text: My item just came in 3days ago and WOW!!!!! I put it on and it held me in so well that i alsmost forgot what i use to look like far as small waistline and flat tummy. Just in the 3 days of having it my waistline and tummy has pulled in perfectly I wear it every day for 8 hours I highly recommend this waist trainer is like no other waist trainer I've ever had I spent over $180 from one company but this waist trainer here is a absolute need to have. I purchased the extra large I should have gotten the large didn't know that it stretches so much that it's just so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ssentoh L.

customer_reviews.title: I Couldn't be Happier
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this waist trainer and I'm sooooo glad I kept searching to find the right one at a great freaking price. I shelled out $78 for my Ann Chery, which at the time was worth it, but this is of equal quality for a fraction of the price. Im so happy with the waist training I've already added another to my cart, but a size smaller because I feel it could be more snugged. I can breath easily and I don't think I'm suppose to 😂. Also it's not really visible under your clothes and definitely not if you're wearing black.
customer_reviews.author: TGranst

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing waist trainers for over a year now. Various types and materials, This is one of my favorites!!! I'm hoping it will last , most of them the boning will start to poke through, some faster than others, the last one like this style, I wore well over 6 months . I hope I get that out of this. Its fits perfect, I'm 5'3 and 150 lbs, I got a small, I will be able in a few months time to take it to the last ring of clasps
customer_reviews.author: Laura holguin

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product, a little hard to put on but ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product , a little hard to put on but definitely worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The material was low quality very uncomfortable and itchy... what I recieved was nothing like the ones in the pictures from other customers. Walmart carries better quality waist trainers then this! I also order two, one black and one beige I recieved my black one but never my beige one. I have request a refund... let's see how this plays out!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE, but...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Great Abdominal Support (For postpartum) * Great quality and durability * Very flexible (good for exercise) * Very comfortable Cons: *Overall “pressure” is off (compared to others, like the Squeem Perfect Waist, this one does not squeeze in my exact waist, like a waist trainer is meant to do) * There’s a strong smell when to it * Runs big (XS for a 27-28” waist and made it to the 3rd row of hooks without much difficulty) I just re-ordered a smaller size and will update if my opinion changes, specially when it comes to pressure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: it smelled like a strong gasoline odor
customer_reviews.text: Once I opened the package, it smelled like a strong gasoline odor. There was no way I was going to put this on my body. I aired it out like they suggested, but that doesnt work. Smell is still there and see it as a risk to even touch it. I am sending it back. I have a real waist trainer from Columbia and the material is not like this one. It's not made the same.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great quality waist trainer but the biggest issue with it is that it smells terrible. Prior to purchasing, I was looking at others reviews and answers to questions and most people say this doesn't smell or that the smell will go away after a few days. That is completely not the case because this has stunk of latex for the past month. Even after hand washing, it smells. I could smell it when I'm just sitting wearing it. I feel like no matter what perfume I wear, the smell still permeates. Really great product itself but the smell is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Rash!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I wore this THREE WEEKS AGO and while it completely did its job and I could have given it 5 stars, TWO WEEKS LATER my boyfriend was like, "What's on your back?" Oh that's right. A rash! No raised skin or bumps but discolored skin from where the latex was. And I don't have a latex allergy so something else is going on. He said the rash is slowly going away but this should NOT be lasting this long. Something is horribly wrong. So if you get this product (cause YES, it works) PLEASE wear something between your skin and the trainer or else you WILL REGRET IT.
customer_reviews.author: A. E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEE
customer_reviews.text: I am on day 3 of waist training now and am completely obsessed with it. It was a pain in the ass to put on the first time but now that i've gotten it down, it takes less that 5 minutes to put on. I can't wait to update this review in a few months when (hopefully) i'll need another size down. I gotta say, it's not totally comfortable to sit all day in but not terrible. Wearing the waist trainer actually keeps me off my ass! :D
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Zeran

customer_reviews.title: Its fits tiiiigghhhhtt!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this trainer is legit! Looks to be very well made and super sturdy hooks. I've purchased many waist trainers and all push out at the bottom( I've had e babies, and I have the mom pouch). This does not! You will have a little back bulge, under your bra, but I can live with that. I'm 8 wks postpartum. So as I lose the weight, it will settle down. I'm excited for results! I've been using a girdle from Bellefit since 3 days postpartum. I've lost 17 lbs wearing it, but I needed something tighter now. I didn't want to spend another 100.00 for Bellefit. This is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Snails4President

customer_reviews.title: More of a back brace
customer_reviews.text: So. I just got this a couple days ago and I’m already on the tightest setting for it. Started on the loose one. It just stretches out and then you have to buy a smaller one. No change in waste line. Still just as chunky. But, I’m using it as a back brace and will continue to do so. It seems better suited as that. So I will keep using it. So 5 stars as a brace. One star as a waist trainer
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, buy this trainer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second trainer I've ever used and as soon as I put it on I saw instant results. This is a great quality trainer! The boning is not flimsy, but it's not so rigid where it's uncomfortable... it's perfect. I'm 5'10 and 190lbs. I bought the medium and am currently wearing it on the first row of hooks which I'm happy about because that means I'll get my money's worth. The trainer comes right under my bra cup and extends down beyond my waistline. If you have a short torso this trainer will be too long for you. If you're looking for instant hourglass shape, a slight breast lift, and improved posture this trainer is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: M Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I received my waist trainer yesterday and immediately took it out of the package and wore it for an hr. Based on the reviews i read, I am 5ft 143 pounds and i ordered a small for a nice snug fit. It fit perfectly and after wearing for an hr i began to instantly see results. It took me a few minutes to get it to close but after that it was fine. It does force your posture to be upright but i could still breathe in it. I plan to wear it again today for 2 hours and just gradually increase until I get completely comfortable. Material is nice and tight. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected at all, not a good waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: I got the size I wanted wich was medium but it was like big like it didn't squeezed my belly like it should like a waist trainer it rolled up in the instant I put it on. Also not good quality and it's not a waist trainer because it doesn't fit tight at all and it rolled up right away. Too small from the height too like the size of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky and runs small.
customer_reviews.text: This runs super small. I’m a 14 in jeans and a L/XL in tops. I have a very small belly but large hips. I had to order a 2XL and even that is tight on my hips. Also the smell is HORRENDOUS when you pull it out of the package. The shaper is also bad about rolling. Kind of disappointed in this item given that it had so many positive reviews. Giving it 2 stars for now until I see any progress.
customer_reviews.author: David Zghaib

customer_reviews.title: DONT THINK, ONE CLICK BUY NOW. YOU NEED.
customer_reviews.text: HOLY CRAP. I've literally had this in my possession for an hour and I can't believe I waited so long to look for something like this. My main goal isn't waist training, but more of smoothing, flattening and giving me a more defined waist. It literally made such a difference and did everything I was wanting. It is very high quality, thick, sturdy material. I tried it on under four different outfits and loved the difference it made. So glad I decided to purchase and I can't wait to have it for the different events I have coming up! Left without, right with.
customer_reviews.author: Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, smells HORRIBLE coming out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: I've lost 25lbs since January 2nd so I thought I'd try out a waist trainer. After reading the reviews and looking at the size chart, I decided on a medium. I'm 5'7", 160lbs. It does not fit yet, unfortunately. Pros: -Looks like it is very sturdy, with ribbing and a solid material holding it together. Cons: -It's too small :( -When I took it out of the bag, the smell was so strong that my two year old cried. The chemical smell stuck to my hands even after I washed them. Safe to say, I'm sort of glad it didn't fit right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best trainers I found on amazon. I am 5’5, 195lbs and large fits me perfectly. I was only able to use the first set of hooks which is ok, my plan is to fit the last hook eventually. It’s very comfortable and offer great posture with out hurting. I only gave it a 4 because mine came smelling like fish. I will try to get the smell out if not I will be returning and reordering. Update: I have no been able to wear this thing since I brought it. It constantly rolls down and I can’t get the fish smell out. I don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole29

customer_reviews.title: Needs a zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these because the large was the to small. I am 5'5' and 155lbs. I then bought a 3xl. It fits but I can't get the buttons or whatever they're called to attach. I even had my husband try to help me put this garment on and we failed. Operator error i guess. Next time I will buy one with a zipper.I didn't return because I ran out of time. Oh well, better luck next time.Don't buy unless you are used to putting this on without a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: If your on the edge of a size and a smaller size here’s a tip: you will fit the smaller size on the last buckle; or you will fit the larger size on the first buckle. If you get the smaller size you will be able to get smaller into it!!!! Either way it will be tight and it works. It helps flatten tummy and isn’t too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: LeAhna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality... I hope it works :)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I followed the size chart and ordered a medium (I’m 5’7 155 lbs and typically wear a size 10). I was able to hook the first row fairly easily. I wore for one hour the first time and an hour and a half the second (just got it yesterday). I’m really hoping that it can help with some definition in my waist and lower abdomen. I don’t think I would be comfortable wearing it to work, but around the house is fine. The hooks seem sturdy and the garment looks and feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I want!
customer_reviews.text: I had one for....not judging....21 years! I bought it right after my son was born. Was the only thing to help me to put everything back to its place. I travel to USA, and I was very skeptical to find another one with the same materials, I bought many with the same promise just to be disappointed. Well I am SOOO happy that finally I found this one. Exactly the same as I had. Ok here the sizes I am 5’2, 138 lbs W30 H38 . I got and S. Why? Because i have a tummy and I want to my body gets slimmer. And I could bottomed on second line of hoops. You will get used to it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: liliana villamil

customer_reviews.title: Im not the same size from hip to under the bust
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well made. I am short waisted and my mid section is bigger than under my bust, so I got it on with the first clasp from the bottom til the top four hooks, then it was too loose, so I have the last hook on the last row, which makes it not smooth. Be sure to measure your waist at the largest part and go by the brand's chart, don't ask what size you are in the questions. I had to return a medium because I couldn't get the ends to even meet. I don't know why Im so bloated but this does hold my fat in.
customer_reviews.author: GJH

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST REAL RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS !! I’ve ordered the exact same one on Instagram “body shapers” SAME EXACT one for 50/60$ more !!!! These are the only ones I’ve seen actual results , ladies a good tip is if you eat before your wearing something more revealing or skin tight wear this while u eat or after for 30- to a hour to help not bloat as bad . The actual LATEX are the best ones in this pic I have on a medium but last hook just purchased a small as well because it helps me lose inches fast ! If you eat right too you’ll lose even faster
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer gal

customer_reviews.title: Barbie waist!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so let me just say that the quality of this product is on point! I have tried many other fajas and trust me I know... I am Colombian lol 😂 So anyway .... it is good quality, you sweat so much with it and it makes your waist look tiny, therefore your booty looks super sized! I love it and I don’t work out without it. Another benefit of this product is not having to use a belt when you lift because it gives your back support and it makes you keep a straight back. It also helps with posture. Totally recommending it! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was my first waist trainer purchase but I think it's pretty good. It does get alittle bendy but I don't know how that can't be avoided when you're sitting and moving in it but it does the job for sure. If you're like me and don't want to spend a fortune on something like this I'd go with this type. You definitely benefit from the material itself because it's that rubbery type that gets warm when you wear it and helps with water weight. I did all the research like alot of other people but no matter what brand you go with they're not magic but this WILL suck you in and keep your stomach tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is a bit off, overall great for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive waist trainer considering the price. It’s got 4 steel bones in it, and 3 sets of hooks for adjusting. After wearing it for a while, it creases in the middle of the stomach which I’m not a huge fan of. The sizing chart is also a little off, I went by it and even on the smallest set of hooks I can fit my whole arm down it. Compared to other ones priced the same on amazon this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: so I normally only order my waist trainers frm Colombian waist website and theres are like $50-$80 but they wrk really well. but over the yr Ive lost and gained weight and the 2 that I have one was Lrge other was XL but some of the hooks broke. so I had to buy a new one and didn't want to spend all that money so I came to amazon which I found this one. it came quickly, fits great!!!! and is comfortable as well. everything is great and the price is way worth it. so far so good for me
customer_reviews.author: Desi -

customer_reviews.title: Made well. If you’re seasoned to waist training buy smaller
customer_reviews.text: This waist trainer is made wonderfully. Strong and sturdy. I have experience with waist training (albeit years ago before babies) and I chose to buy 2 sizes small than the size chart recommended. I measured a 36 in waist and I got the medium. I have to lay down to hook it closed, but it feels perfect. I wore it day 1 for about 4 hours and it felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Thibs

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS FAJA! 💖💖💖
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this faja! (purchased a size small)It's perfect! Comfortable, gives me good posture, and works great! Makes me sweat A LOT! when im at the gym. Holds my waist in perfectly! Im in love! I wear it everyday since i received it and i see results! My waist is getting smaller my stomach flatter. Of course with exercise and eating right helps. I say a couple of weeks more and i will buy the extra small. ☺ waist training is dope! I had bought waist trainers before but they're nothing like this one! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND if u wanna see results! I LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! THIS FAJA! 🤗💖🤗💖🤗💖🤗
customer_reviews.author: Tamara rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: For a long torso
customer_reviews.text: This cincher is very snug and has a 3 columns of snaps an inch apart, so it is "adjustable". My problem is that I am 135 lbs. 5'4 and the garment is so long that when i sit it cuts into my thighs & rib cage below my breasts. I returned it for the Lover Beauty short torso which I haven't tried yet but looks good. There's about a 2" difference in length.
customer_reviews.author: Randi k

customer_reviews.title: Went from thick to snack
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I was truly skeptical about purchasing this waist trainer. I am measured out to be 52” I purchased 3XL. I have purchased several and have been let down. I finally came across this trainer and I am feeling myself. I’m a big girl no doubt about that however the trainers can stretch and your still able to breath. I went from plus side model to looking like a snack lol. You can’t even tell I am Wearing it!!! It is LONG TORSO!!!!! Repeat LONG TORSO which is so hard to find when your a fine plus size model like myself lol. Thank you so much! I truly love this trainer.
customer_reviews.author: VANNA ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: STILL WAIST TRAINING
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this waist trainer a few weeks ago and I love it! The size small fits as expected and I’m currently on the last hook, won’t be long before I purchase the XS. I wear it 5-6 hours a day, even when I workout lifting heavy weights or doing cardio. It really makes my stomach sweat! I also drink detox tea and combined with this waist trainer, it really makes a difference. I can see the results with my waist and stomach getting smaller but also remember that your diet plays a key role in losing weight. Eat healthy! I love this waist trainer because it has a sexy look and my husband loves it also! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Shirrell N.

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL after seeing a few reviews say to go with a smaller size. My waist is 39”, and it fits. It took me a few minutes to get it on the first time. Mostly because the hooks themselves are so tight. I put it on again this morning, and it was much easier! It is very comfortable. I like the feeling of compression anyway, and the material is smooth and comfortable against your body. The first time, I also felt like fat/skin were pushed up above the corset. I must have not positioned it quite right because it did not this morning. I ordered the blue leopard print, and it is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Waited few months to review this item. Came to write a review cuz there is so many of these and they are expensive and not even quality. However, this one is a total different story. It definitely does the job of sucking you in. Quality is amazingggg, they thought of everything and I definitely have recommended this to my friends and family. If you’re looking to buy one but don’t want to spend a lot of money on it I would get this one for sure. The price is reasonable but the quality is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amela Kuduzovic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This review will just be my first impression because I just received it. The waist trainer itself is pretty solid. Weighs more than I expected. Makes me feel like it is made very well and will last me as long as I need it to. I am 5'3" and 169 pounds and I purchased a medium. Getting it on was a little tough but I layed down and got it done. This waist trainer makes me look amazing but I'm wondering if I should have went with the large first because my upper ribcage is in a little pain. I think it's just from the squeezing because the rest fits the way I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this waist trainer😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this waist shaper😍. It's though and the hooks are well made. I was expecting something cheap and thin, but this surprised the heck out of me. From all the other reviews I thought it was going to smell bad but that was wrong also. I put this bad boy on as soon as I opened the bag. It smells a like latex (but duhh, it's made from it, not overwhelming how some people was exaggerating) but no problem. I'm 5'9 and it practically covers my whole torso with a little space between my rib and boobs. I just bought another one for my friend and will definitely be buying more as I progress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waist Training
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I’m 4’11, around 125-130 lbs. I have a pretty curvy body, wide hips for my size and have waist trained before so I decided to go with an X-Small because my previous waist trainer is/was an XX-Small (despite the fact it’s like 4-5 years old.) This fits completely different, a lot tighter than my XX-Small. It took me around 10-15 minutes to actually fully get this waist trainer on. Once it’s on, it feels normal to me but I’m use to waist training. Great material, definitely feels high quality for the price. I like it a lot, just alittle tighter than expected but rather have it to tight than to loose. Other than that, it’s great, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. First time user here.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 126 pounds. I purchased the small. I’ve never used one before and after having a baby I wanted something to help shape my figure back to pre pregnancy. At first getting this thing on wasn’t easy. I seemed way too small. But after a few hard pulls and tugs I got it! The second time getting it on was much easier. From what I’ve read it just needs some stretching and a little getting used to on your end. So far very comfy for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: The Best Faja
customer_reviews.text: I received it today so it might be too early for a review but I'm doing it anyways. I did wear it for about 30 minutes and that's good enough for me to do a review. It's what I wanted and need it. The material is a 10 out of 10 fits wonderfully size it's as expected. I'm a size small. 120lbs 5"1 I wanted to order a size xs but they did not have it in the beige color so I decided to ordered a size small after watching a review on YouTube. Would I recommend this faja to anyone YES 100%
customer_reviews.author: SoBe

customer_reviews.title: Latex on the outside not the inside ???????
customer_reviews.text: This product has latex - on the outside! Why would a company put the silky fabric on the inside and the latex on the outside? Who knows but it sticks to my dress and slides up over the bust. It is bizarre! I think someone got it backward. Be careful if you’ve had any kind of previous injury. The boning works like a back brace. When you take it off there is pain pain pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Get it! Ya'll, I don't know how, but it is making a serious difference in my waist. It smooths me out throughout the day, makes me feel a little more confident and less self conscious. AND! When I take it off at night, my waist is smaller. When I wake up in the morning, I look like I did 2 years ago! It's crazy. Idk if its bc it smushed your stomach and you eat less, but literally, it's amazing. Do it!!!! Also, I'm 5'4 and 160-165 and got an XL, wish I had gotten a L. I'll probably order another one next week.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Dunn

customer_reviews.title: 2 times wrong size. But great material/product
customer_reviews.text: I orderd 2 of them. 1 in l and 1 in xl. I recieved 2 size l corsets. I returned one and orderd again a xl. The "xl" arrived today and turned out to be a l again. Overall the quality is amazing and it really reshaped my waist. Its wonderful to wear under clothes. (Its more comfortable than I expected) I just really hope I can get the xl so I know I'm wearing the right size. So hopefully I can contact the company and see what might have gone wrong. Overall I definitely recommend but did get the wrong size 2 times..
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job. Visible under form fitting clothing.
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a pleasant surprise. It was my first time using a waist trainer. I'm 5'6 and 182 so I got the extra large. Getting it on was a struggle initially, but I was able to fit it on the last hooks. It definitely smoothed me out! I appreciated the boning which did immediately make me hyper aware of my posture, without limiting my movement. I would recommend you measure yourself per the size chart if possible. It was comfortable and easy to wear. Definitely visible under any form fitting clothing. Provides a great midsection sweat. Excellent product and would recommend for a first time waist trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Best corset /waist trainer ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing corset/waist trainer. I got a size XS and I have a size 29 waist. I'm 5'4" 146, but I have a super small upper body. I'm 18 days post partum and have been wearing waist trainers since my c section. I got a small waist trainer from a different company and it was too big after a day, so I wanted to get an xs here since that brand didnt have an xs. It was very hard to get on (because I got such a small size for my waist size) but I got it on and I love it. I had a size 24 waist before I got pregnant so figures xs would fit me
customer_reviews.author: Tarah Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very important for sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not let these heffas lie to you! Someone who is probably alrdy skinny to begin with, said to get the trainer 2 sizes smaller. DONT! I was silly enough to listen. I'm normally a med. Got the trainer in a xsmall. Took me 32 minutes to put it on. It looked great ofcourse, but when I decided breathing would be nice, i attempted to take it off. FOR 48 MINUTES I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO TAKE THIS OFF!!!! Im on my 2nd break, third attempt. Quality is amazing. Smells like rubber though. Overall I think it's an amazing product, just PLEASE do not go down in size!
customer_reviews.author: Robin cahill

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st time wearing/using a waist trainer. Pros: it is super comfortable to wear and the latches are extremely durable. Cons: I feel that the product could be better if the top was smaller than bottom. I wear a M/L in shirts. 5’2, 160lbs. I purchased the large and although it fits nice and tight at the bottom, the top is a bit big. I can clip in to the smallest option but the bottom part can only attach to the largest option, for now (pics attached). Overall, great buy and I can’t wait to size down!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: What I don't like is that the tightness is only on the upper area of the stomach, not the lower. Around my waist is cool, but this isn't helping my lower tummy at all. And the top part buckles under, becoming uncomfortable. You get what you pay for though. I'd rather pay double the money and get a better quality trainer from waistshaperz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order size up very small ..Beware no EXCHANGE
customer_reviews.text: 1star for long process and no exchange had to contact seller Update * I now gave it 3 stars because I’m still not happy with the new one The Seller did replace it for me but still send out the wrong size so I’m 36 waist they sent XL it fits comfortably but not tight enough for hour glass look I guess I’m stuck with this one so order correctly other then that the product itself is great material I love it just wish I got the right size after all the hassle I went thru
customer_reviews.author: wahoowillie754

customer_reviews.title: Just a week and seeing results
customer_reviews.text: This is my first waist trainer, so I've got nothing to compare it to. I have been wearing it 8-10 hours a day for 7 days now (today is my 8th). I have already moved down a row. The second row feels how the first row did when I started wearing it. I have been eating the same (healthy) and working out my regular amount (5-6 days a week). So from what I can tell the wrap works! Definitely worth it if you're just trying to slim down a little int he waist. Obviously not if you're needing more extreme results. I am typically a size s/m and I ordered the m. 155 lbs, 5'7"
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: SMELLED LIKE FISH
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say how it fits because I won’t be wearing it. Once I got it, I opened the package and “unrolled” the corset and was hit with the strongest FISH SMELL!! It smelled like it was sitting in a fish market for years. It was gagging us, it smells disgusting!! I’ve washed it 3 times and there is still a fishy smell to it. I’ve never had this happen before but it’s nasty and even if I can get the smell out, it’s embedded in my brain now and I can’t look at this thing without smelling it 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Yellow 11

customer_reviews.title: Size Chart is inaccurate but great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Based on my waistline and the size chart, I should have ordered an XL. I ordered both an XL and a Medium. The Medium works wonderfully. If I followed the size chart, the XL would not have "held me all in" :) The Medium works great! Snug, gives me the curves I want and holds up well while wearing! It stays in place and stays comfortable, all while doing the job. I recommend this product but think twice about the size you are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the latex waist trainers better than any other material. I bought one back in 2015 from another seller and that one was my best one. This new one, the sides don't go in too deep not giving an hour glass shape. It still has a good length that it tucks in the lower belly pooch. It leaves the stomach flatter than my previous one. I also have a deep arch on my lower back and this trainer gives more relief..no stiff wires. It's smooth latex. My old one would irritate if rubbed on my skin wrong. Nice quality. Just wish for more an hour glass shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: CORSET INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really wear waist trainers because of corset but I wanted another alternative when I sleep or when I’m going for a run cause corsets are really thick and I live in Miami and I just cant wear corsets outside, it hasn’t done much in waist Reduction but it’s not going to it doesn’t have support if your reading this and you think this is gonna help you lose inches on your waist it’s most likely not, just start corseting, you can get some on amazon for this price
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are on point for the product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trainer. I read the reviews prior to purchasing and was sold. I enjoy the latex and the flexibility the trainer has. The size chart is on point as well. If you want to go smaller, you can but I would only suggest ONE size down. It can get VERY tight if you get it too small. But all the reviews that were positive we’re on point. I also love the three latches so when I lose weight/inches I can size down without buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 2 months now. At first I LOVED it! Even told my mom yo buy one too. But after 2 months the thing is useless. The top ans bottom of it curl in like a crease and is painful. I've tried to put it on without it folding but it just seems to be bad quality. Also the shape did not hold up. For reference I am 5'7 160lbs, and I ordered a Large. Only buy this if you plan on using this for a couple months. Quality is very bad!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I waited to at least wear this a couple days before giving it a review so here it is. Please buy this waist trainer it’s the best one I’ve ever purchased. It’s very comfortable and you can stand to keep it on for hours without it being painful. I’m 5 feet 2 173lbs I ordered the large which is my size and if fit at the last hook. That’s great because your suppose to work your way up to the last hook that’s how you know your making progress. This was also extremely affordable and well worth the money would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: asantewaa

customer_reviews.title: This waist shaper has a horrific odor...like petroleum.  Will not wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these Lady Slim garments. One in 2xs, and the other in xs hoping to wear the larger one, then be able to fit the smaller one. i will wear neither, as the SMELL is like jet fuel. I have left them outdoors to air out, but to no avail. I have had trouble before with 3rd party sellers on Amazon. It is a bid deal to send back and there usually is an argument. These 2 'shapers' will be donated. Don't think I will order anything else if not from Amazon directly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

product_meta.title: Lady Slim Fajas Colombiana Latex Waist Trainer Cincher Trimmer Corset Weight Loss Shaper
feature_bullets: Our Latex is 100% natural The latex layer will increase your abdominal area temperature (Sauna Effect), it will cause you to sweat and reshape and reduce fat deposits.

HOW TO CHOOSE YOUR SIZE: THE BEST WAY TO CHOOSE THE APPROPRIATE SIZE IS BY MEASURING YOUR WAISTLINE AND COMPARE THE MEASUREMENT AGAINST THE SIZE CHART. Please do not choose based on other buyers experience, your body is unique. To properly choose your size, measure your waistline and choose based on the measurement indicated on the size chart. This faja girdle is not recommended to women taller than 5’8”.

ITEM DESCRIPTION: High Quality durable Latex Waist Trainer Cincher for Women Made in Colombia. This Waist Cincher will reduce up to three inches from your waist instantly. The flexible boning provides the structure that allows the latex cincher to help you correct your posture. It also helps to avoid the cincher from rolling up when you seat or move. The 3 hook rows allows for size adjustment when you need more pressure (caused weight loss).

ABOUT LATEX: Our Latex is 100% natural and with a very little smell. This smell is temporary and will go away in no more that 3 to 4 days. If you do not like the smell leave your cincher in a well ventilated area and it will go away.The latex layer will increase your abdominal area temperature (Sauna Effect), it will cause you to sweat and reshape and reduce fat deposits. The inner layer has been designed to absorb the sweat so that you will not feel uncomfortable.

ABOUT OUR QUALITY: Not all waist cinchers are created equal, our product is manufactured in Colombia in our factory, and we have been manufacturing waist cincher for more than 20 years. Our Waist Cinchers have been designed to last many months used on a daily basis. The latex core of this product is approved to be used on your body. Many other cinchers use rubber witch is harmful for your health.

ITEM OTHER USES: This product strong enough to be used as a Boned Waist Training Corset, if you are into Waist Training this product will help you with that. Some buyers has reported good results as Waist Training Belt or Waist Band. Use with proper clothing it will be also invisible, buyer use this product under their clothing at work, the molding pressure and the sauna effect will help to make this product your best Waist Trimmer.
